items.sentence: Could you tell me how to get to the art museum?
Tom must've thought Mary couldn't speak French.
Without saying another word, Tom left the room.
Do I need to remind you what Tom did last time?
The thermometer reads three degrees below zero.
I've got some ice cream here. Do you want some?
Tom said that he wasn't really having much fun.
If you don't finish the job, you won't be paid.
That sounds like something that I'd like to do.
You don't realize how hard I've worked on this.
